alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 05 at 3:58AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Colder with gusty winds and scattered snow showers today through this evening, with patchy ice possible tonight... * A colder area of low pressure will bring bands of snow showers to western Nevada today. Slick driving conditions may occur at times, especially in the foothills above 5000 feet. For tonight, paved surfaces that didn`t have enough time to dry out could develop slick icy patches as temperatures drop below freezing. * Winds: Breezy southwest to west winds are expected today, with gusts to 35 mph. A few wind prone areas may receive gusts up to 50 mph. * Convective snow showers will bring quick bursts of moderate to heavy snowfall and rapid changes in visibility to portions of western Nevada today. While overall snowfall amounts are not expected to be significant across the area, be sure to check roadway conditions before heading out.

area.areaDesc: Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
